headline: Akamai Is Recognized as a 2026 Gartner® Peer Insights™ Customers’ Choice for Network Security Microsegmentation
summary: The Gartner® Peer Insights™ Customers’ Choice recognition is based on feedback and ratings from end-user professionals who have experience with the product or serviceCAMBRIDGE, Mass., Jan. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), has been named a Customers’ Choice in the January 2026 Gartner Peer Insights “Voice of the Customer” for Network Security Microsegmentation. headline: Is Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Akamai Technologies is priced attractively today, you are not alone. This article will help you weigh what the current share price might be implying.
